para.text: Example 1 is described beginning on p. 85 of the PHAST documentation (

). The flow and transport data file itself begins on p. 88. If PHAST is installed on a Windows computer at the default location, this file can be found at C:\Program Files\USGS\phast-1.5.1\examples\ex1\ex1.trans.dat. To follow this example, the user should open this file in a text editor. For the most part, the various data sets will be specified in the same order in which they appear in the original input file. The one exception will be the grid. It will be specified before anything else.
